Column Comment.0: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE: Unique identifier for a business associate, such as aperson, company, regulatory agency, government or consortium.
Column Comment.1: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE ORGANIZATION IDENTIFIER: unique identifier for anorganization of a company or organization.
Column Comment.2: ORGANIZATION SEQUENCE NUMBER: a unique number added to alloworganizations to be versioned over time.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y or N flag indicating whether this row of data is currentlyeither active/valid (Y) or inactive/invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: ADDRESS OBSERVATION NUMBER: A number used to uniquely identifying anaddress for a Business Associate.
Column Comment.5: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.6: AREA ID: Unique identifier for any named area such as a country, province, projectarea, area of interest, offshore area, district etc.
Column Comment.7: AREA TYPE: The type of area described, such as country, province, basin, project,business area etc.
Column Comment.8: CREATED DATE: Date on which the capture of an organization structure wascreated.
Column Comment.9: DESCRIPTION: describes the organization reporting structure.
Column Comment.10: EFFECTIVE DATE: date on which the organization reporting structure was valid.
Column Comment.11: EXPIRY DATE: Date on which the organization reporting structure was not valid.
Column Comment.12: ORGANIZATION NAME: The name given to the organization, such as WesternDevelopment Unit.
Column Comment.13: R BA ORGANIZATION TYPE: may be department, division, cost center, businessunit, franchise etc.
Column Comment.14: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.15: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.16: REMOVED DATE: Date on which the organization structure was removed
Column Comment.17: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.18: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.19: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.20: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.21: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.22: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.23: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.24: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
